maqras.text: Geukheun le teuma le rakan nyang nyoe Hai Tuhan kamoe droejih nyang salah Di lon hana jih lon peuceulaka Droejih usaha sisat that leupah Jioh that sisat ka jiusaha
Neukheun boh nyo ka bek le meubantah Di keu Lon sinoe bek le meudawa Yoh dilee cit ka janji Lon peugah Janji that saket Lon kheun bak gata
Jinoe meudawa hana phaedah Putosan bak Lon han jeut le tuka Kon Lon elanya dum hamba Allah
Uroe nyan meukheun ubak nuraka Peue teuma haba ka peunoh di kah Peue na tamah lom jitanyong sigra
Soe nyang takwa teuma meutuah Hana that jioh sinan churuga Geutamong lanja keunan le bagah
Nyoe nyang geujanji dilee keu gata Sabab dum gata toubat bak Allah Bandum peurintah sabe geujaga
Allah Taʻala han tom geubantah Takot keu Tuhan bah hana leumah Han geu tem seumah meunyo kon Allah Toubat lam ate sabe bak Tuhan
Keudeh u dalam jak tamong bagah Saleum seulamat keu bandum gata Keukai rok masa sinan geukeubah
Peue-peue nyang meuhʻeut di sinan ka nat Nyang laen teuma lom Kamoe tamah
Padum le dilee ka peubinasa Nyang teuga-teuga beuho sileupah Leubeh beuho jih nibak awaknyoe Padum le nanggroe ka di jeulajah Ho jikeumeung plueng teuma uroe nyoe
Bandum atra nyoe tatueng phaedah Jeut keupeuingat keu soe nyang pike Nyang na lam ate sipheut meutuah Nyang got jideungo peue nyang jikalon
Kamoe pakriban kuasa leupah Ka Kamoe peujeut langet ngon bumoe Ngon bandum asoe keubit that bagah Meupeujeut bandum dalam nam uroe Teuma di Kamoe hana meupayah
Teuma tasaba jikheun barangpeue Di gata pujoe mantong keu Allah Takheun teuseubeh tapujoe Tuhan Uroe ngon malam sabe di babah Beungoh yoh goh teubiet uroe Goh jilop uroe pih bek takeubah
Takheun teuseubeh lom watee malam ‘Oh lheuh seumbahyang sujud bak Allah
Beu got tadeungo watee geumeuhoi Le ureueng meuhoi nyang toe sileupah
Uroe nyan bandum deungo su raya Su sangka kala cit hana salah Beuna that nyan keuh uroe geunbangket
Kamoe peuudep bandum cit mudah Kamoe peuudep Kamoe peumate Meuwoe keudeh le bandum bak Allah Bandum teuh teuma tawoe bak Kamoe
Beukah ngon bumoe teubiet dum bagah Meusapat bandum teuma bak Kamoe Teuma atra nyoe leupah that mudah
Teuma Kamoe roe nyang leubeh teupue Bah barangkapeue peue nyang jipeugah Hana kreuh gata teuma ateuh jih Tapeuingat jih hana phaedah Deungon Qur'an nyoe tapeuingat Ureueng that takot janji Lon peugah
Demi angen kreuh jipho peurabe
Awan meuteuntee ujeun jiruwah
Demi dum kapai jijak mudah that
Dum malaikat jak bagi tugah
Keubit nyang janji geubri keu gata Leupah that beuna hana meusalah
Geubalah amai pih keubit beuna
Di langet teuma jalan le leupah
Teuma dum gata le that meudawa
Na nyang han suka deungo peurintah
Awak nyang sulet keunong muruka
Jinom lam paya jahe sileupah
Jitanyong pajan uroe kiamat
Uroe nyan meuhat azeub that payah Geupeulop jih dum dalam nuraka
Jinoe karasa pakri geubalah Dilee kalakee beu rijang teuka Nyoe keuh ka teuka azeub that leupah
Keubit roe teuma ureueng takwa Dalam churuga keubon nyan indah Mata ie sinan pih jeureuengeh that
Keu gopnyan meuhat Neubri le Allah Dumpeue nyang Neubri uleh Po gopnyan Geucok bandum nyan seunang sileupah Amai geuh dilee got that amalan
‘Oh teungoh malam geubeudoh bagah Nit that nyang geueh bak watee malam
Geulakee ampon dacha bak Allah Bak watee saho geubeudoh laju Ampon Tuhanku sibarang salah
Arta gopnyan sit hak gop laen Keu ureueng gasien lakee seudeukah Nyang hana lakee pih geujok ligat Ureueng gasien that sayang sileupah
Teuma di bumoe sit le that tanda Soe nyang peucaya yakin keu Allah
Peue hana taeu lom bak droe gata
Raseuki gata pih Tuhan keubah Di langet sideh Neubri raseuki Lom nyang ka janji Neubri le Allah
Demi Po langet deungon Po bumoe Janji Tuhan nyoe beuna that leupah Saban ngon beuna narit dum gata Nyang tabicara nyang hana salah
Peue na troh haba keunan bak gata Jamee nyan teuka keudeh geulangkah Ubak Ibrahim jamee nyan teuka Jamee mulia surohan Allah
‘Oh ban geutamong ubak Ibrahim Geumeubri saleum teuma le bagah Geujaweub saleum hana lon turi
Tamong bak ahli teuma geupeugah Jeh aneuk leumo saboh nyang teumbon
Tabri makanan jamee troh langkah Pakon dum hana tacok makanan
Ibrahim yoh nyan teumakot leupah Han peue tatakot kheun dum ureueng nyan Kamoe ba peusan sideh bak Allah Geupeugah treuk na haba gembira Lahe aneukda sidroe nyang ceudah
Teuma peurumoh nabi Ibrahim Oh geudeungo nyan karu geuh leupah Geupoh-poh muka geukheun peue haba Lon nyoe ka tuha peue nyan tapeugah Lon nyoe ka tuha lom pih lon male
(Jamee dum kheun le hana peue susah Meunan ka Neukheun le Tuhan gata That bijaksana peue nyang Neupeugah JUZ 27) Allah Taʻala dumpeue Neuteupue Hana meusapeue pih na meuilah
